attributes.title: Never downloading again
attributes.review: I got this app to see what our ✨Sour Orange✨ has been doing and it took 9 hours to download!!!! After I woke up brushed my teeth are some food then I went to watch some tv when I remembered that I downloaded the app and when I went in I had a HEART ATTACK the app is the worst thing on this planet because because becauseeee................................................bye

attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app. took a MONTH to fully download and once it did my phone CRACKED, just out of the blue. strange right? well after that, i woke up one week later and my phone was SMASHED to pieces!! 🧿🕳🧿. after that i had to get a NEW phone. and THEN i had to get a new APPLE ID because my phone did it again and downloaded 20 VIRUSES onto my phone.

attributes.title: Disappointing.
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of showing my support for the Trump 2020 campaign, but it’s terrible. It took forever for things to load and kept glitching out. I signed up and put in my information, and I started getting odd emails and notifications? i’m not sure, but i definitely would not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: When i got this app i was expecting it to solve all my problems, yet here i am😔. the 𝑜𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑔𝑒 lied now i have no choice except to leave a bad review. maybe there will be something i can do to for fill my life. until than i will have to go back to being disappointed. i expected more from 𝕓𝕦𝕟𝕜𝕖𝕣 𝕓𝕠𝕪.

attributes.title: NOT WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so that I could receive instructions from our lord and savior Donald Trump🥰🥰✨ but instead my phone blew up with a bunch of liberal propaganda!!😠it was ridiculous. just tons of pure facts and evidence about the racial injustices in our society👨🏻‍🦯👨🏻‍🦯👨🏻‍🦯not to mention, all of my phones data was shared and exploited to russia and north korea. Hopefully Mr. Trump can make his app great again😘

attributes.title: No ❤️🤡
attributes.review: A first I was satisfied with this app, but then something weird kept happening. I kept seeing this thing pop up on my screen. I think it was a Cheeto 🥖 or an orange 🍊 but I’m not sure. Anyways, the ✨Cheeto✨ kept telling me to do things like make America great again... my mom told me never buy into peer pressure. 🙄🙄🙄 I would not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: Is this a joke?
attributes.review: This could possibly be the worst app on the app store. My mans a multi millionaire and president and can’t even have an app that downloads correctly and runs without lagging. He thinks we ain’t going to lose without a fight. Now mans got a war. This is a joke of an app and needs to be removed immediately unless apple wants to support this garbage.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it deleted all of my photos and all of my apps and texted everyone in my contacts that I wish they were dead and then it sent a virus to my phone and it exploded and then it exploded my computer and my entire house. This app is horrible now I’m homeless😾 now Trump is trying to murder my family. So now I’m voting for biden😤

attributes.title: this app is ✨garbage✨
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so that i could keep up with rumps campaign. first of all it took 43 hours to download and then when it finally did download it made my phone much slower. as i was investigating this app to try and see how it works i came across a link on the home page that led me to videos of torture and child porn, i was disgusted mainly by the crime shown on my screen. but, i was also disgusted to see donald trump naked. his woody was quite small and was all sorts of different colors. it made me throw up!! i gave this app a one star, i wish i could leave zero stars though!🤢

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: This app brought such terrible viruses to my phone and I would not stop receiving texts!! Sure I was curious about trumps plans but I didn’t want to be harassed by this god forsaken app! I wouldn’t wish this on my worst enemy! I’m going to have to go to the apple store and get this whole mess figured out, thanks for NOTHING TRUMP!! 😡😡 wish I could give negative ratings !
